level.text: In accordance with ยง 202(e) of the D.C. Procurement Practices Act of 1985 (the “Act”), D.C. Code ยง 1-1182.2 (1992 Repl. Vol.), the Executive Director shall ensure that a material management information system (“MMIS”) is established by the Agency, and that this MMIS is compatible with the reporting system required under ยง 202(d) of the Act, in accordance with rules issued by the Mayor which specify MMIS reporting formats, minimum levels of information, and other data concerning procurement operations and compliance with applicable law.
